nodes.text: Kothtri was a traditional type of spiced fruit juice that originated on Bothawui, a Mid Rim planet that was the homeworld of the Bothan species. The Bothans, who found the beverage enjoyable, used "Kothtri" as a first name for some members of the female sex.

Kothtri was first mentioned in the Galactic Campaign Guide, a 2003 sourcebook for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game, written by Peter Schweighofer and J.D. Wiker. The fruit juice was only described in a table of Bothan female names; the book did not mention when the juice was imbibed or when it was considered traditional.
